title: Call screening
content: I can't seem to get the call screening option "on. " I have version 31.024 of the phone app and have reset it and cleared its cache with the help of Google support.   In the phones settings,  there isn't even a call screen option & I don't get the option for incoming calls.   Google support said it either hasn't been turned on for me yet or Verizon doesn't support the feature.   Any other ideas?
